title: #1477 Meghan Daum
itunes:title: #1477 Meghan Daum
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show paying off a tease from the last episode in reviewing two videos to see how different news organizations are conversing about topics like Ivermectin. They then turn to Zoom as they welcome in returning guest podcaster & author Meghan Daum. The gang discuss cancel culture, the vastly changing landscape of news organizations and much much more.

Please Support Our Sponsors:
TenThousand.CC, code ADS
